Analyse co-expression conservation across cell types

Source: R/coexpression_analysis.R
analyse_coexpression_conservation.Rd

Analyses how conserved co-expression patterns are across different cell types, identifying isoform pairs with consistent relationships.

Usage

analyse_coexpression_conservation(
  integrated_scht,
  gene,
  method = "pearson",
  min_cells = 10,
  min_expression = 0,
  consistency_threshold = 0.7,
  correlation_threshold = 0.3
)

Arguments

integrated_scht

IntegratedSCHT object

gene

Gene to analyse

method

Correlation method

min_cells

Minimum cells per cell type

min_expression

Minimum expression threshold

consistency_threshold

Proportion of cell types needed for "conserved" classification

correlation_threshold

Threshold for considering a correlation significant (default: 0.3)

Value

Conservation analysis results
